cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on May 26, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 164, A bill to authorize the Seminole Tribe of Florida to lease or transfer certain land, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 2 (Monday, January 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SOTO:
H.R. 164.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, of the United States Constitution.
[Page H55]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 314.

title: To authorize the Seminole Tribe of Florida to lease or transfer certain land, and for other purposes.
